Review: The shade is good but disappointed that it chips after sometime. Really upsetting.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Creamy texture which gives smooth application. Moreover, the tip is sharp, which gives a high ease when trying to colour the corners of the lips. However, the tip tends to be a bit hard as well.     Shortly after applying I felt that the ink is abit sticky on the lips, which went away after a while.  It is surprisingly very transfer proof, as it did not come off when I tried to rub it off with my fingers. However, when I tried to remove it with my make up remover, some of  the product stayed on my lips. Not sure if the product is too strong or the make up remover (water based) is weak.     The colour is highly pigmented which suits perfectly on my lips and I would highly recommend this product to everyone!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Super stay matte ink really stays! However, becareful not to apply wrongly as it is really difficult to remove. It will take a few mins to dry, after it dried, it really stays. Whether eating or drinking, it does not stain. I've been looking for a lip color that stays and this one really does the job.. it does accentuate the dry lines on my lips to a mild extent and also be sure to exfoliate the dead skin on your lips before applying this. I got the heroine color but it's too red for my liking.  I'll probably buy the other pinkish colors.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I've tried this product with and without a lip moisturizer.  First day without a lip moisturizer base (Vaseline), it feels quite dry and cakey on my lips.  Second day I applied a thin layer of Vaseline before putting it on, it feels great. Needed very little touch up as I tend to wipe my mouth after a few bites of food.  This stays on quite nicely.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip odour glided smoothly, stayed matte and required no touch ups as it was pretty much stuck to my lips. However, having said that, it can be a bit drying if no lipbalm was worn prior to application. The colour I was given was Lover. The shade on the casing looked perfect, however it‚Äôs brighter inside. Wish the content could be more similar to the colour on the casing. If Maybelline could make this less drying and true to shade, this would be the ideal lip product for all.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Loves how easy and smooth it is to apply on my lip! The color is able to stay on after a long day out, hence it is recommended for people who is lazy to constantly touching up.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The Lipstick is easy to apply and colour stays on long and nice. It is comfortable and not feeling sticky or too watery. But the only downside of the lipstick is the smell. It will be better if there is fragrance added or reduce the strong smell.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Love the neutral color & texture is pretty smooth to apply on.  Superstay Matte Ink provides moisture to my lips as well, will definitely recommend to my friends!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: This stays on for long periods and it doesn't stain cups BUT it dries up the lips a little bit much. Overall still satisfactory

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Just tried it and it lives up to its superstay reputation. Lasted through the whole day despite oily food and coffee straight from a cup. Colour is cute and matte, has a slightly sticky feeling to it but still "superstay". Not too used to the applicator yet but it comes with practice. Would recommend!!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I think we‚Äôve become quite familiar with how this lippie has looked on me these couple of weeks! I received it from @tryandreviewasia and have been testing it out for a couple of weeks though I have not put it through a full 16 hours.  .  It‚Äôs a beautiful dark red liquid lipstick that is easy to apply with the tear drop shape applicator. I usually do it in the train on my way to dinner and have gotten a beautiful application everytime. It dries matte, isn‚Äôt drying. and does not transfer, all our lippie dreams come true. It sits very comfortably on top of a layer of lip balm and reapplies beautifully.  .  Unfortunately I am doubtful it will last the promised 16 hours on me without touch ups and I haven‚Äôt even tried. Why? Because it simply doesn‚Äôt last beyond a meal. The area around my mouth will disappear and I‚Äôm left with butt hole lips.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I'm always a fan of lip products but can't find one that is really moisturising and can last me the whole day without touching up. All the products I tried claims that it can last the whole day but to my disappointment it didn't work and furthermore made my lips dry. I'm thankful and lucky to be able to try this amazing product and I can say it last me more than 16HR. I think it's super worth it because u can look pretty the whole day without constant touching up

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: It is abit dry. But it is very lasting. After meals most of my lipstick still stay.  However I have dry lips so it‚Äôs cracks abit

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Glides on smoothly.  Not as dry as majority of Matte Lipsticks.  Doesn't rub off easily even with greasy food.  Some cracking and wrinkling after eating and some pale spots but still looks almost flawless.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Went out for the night and had steamboat for dinner. Was amazed at how I didn't have to reapply the lipstick after dinner because it was so long-lasting. The only downside of this product is that it may be slightly dry on the lips, however, it can be fixed by applying lip balm after the lipstick :) Highly recommended to everyone!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Pros:   1) Definitely its lasting power! This does NOT come off even with Dettol/ Life Bouy soap! As clearly seen in the photos, after soaping, rubbing, scrubbing it on my hand after the hand swatch, this DOES not come off. Unbelievable. But that's exactly what ALL lipsticks should be.     2) Formula is ALSO better than Kylie J's - more fluid (greater for beginners) when applied, compared to Kylie's which is more creamy.     Verdict: Move over Kylie Liquid Lipsticks. This Maybelline Matte Ink is taking over!    Cons:  1) Slightly Sticky when applied on hand for swatch. However, this is not as apparent when on hand. :)    2) More range of colours please!   I wore the shade of No. 15 Lover, which reminds me alot like Kylie Jenner's liquid lipstick in Shade POSIE K. This may suit better on cool & fair skin tones. I personally suit nuder shades for my warm and slightly tan skin tone (shades like Kat Von D in Cathedral, Smashbox in Cognac, Wet n Wild in Give Me Mocha.)

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love that the color is very pigmented! However, in general, as matte lip products are very dry, I had to apply some lip mask/lip protector before applying this. Hence, the color will stain cups and burgers

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: First time using a liquid lisptick and I think I found myself a new fave lipstick - Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I had a heavy lunch and some desserts for tea break while wearing this and I was pleasantly surprised that I didn‚Äôt have to reapply throughout the day!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick fades away fast from my lips and I've tried a few brands. If it doesn't disappear fast, I think leaves my lips dry.     This lipstick is exactly what my lips needs.     Colour range is awesome - though I'd love for them to have more.     Application is smooth! One dip is more than enough. Trust me. All you need I say to apply thin - or at least enough to cover your lips.     It stays more than 16hours. I know, I'm not supposed to, but I accidentally slept with it. It stayed until the next day. That's about 24hrs!    Doesn't smudge too unless it's exposed to liquids for too long. Ie: in the shower for 10 minutes with constant water running down my face. With that said, there's no transfers when eating or drinking.     Oh! It also doesn't leave my lips dry.     Smells good. In case this isn't the case for everyone, I got the shade Lover.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: It does really stay up to 16 hrs! Even after meals the lipstick does not come off. The only thing about it is that the applicator is not very good, it doesnt hold a lot of product & the first layer will not give you the coverage you want. It does need awhile longer to dry compared to other liquid lipsticks & when it does dry it feels sticky.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip product does works as it promise...it does stay up quite long till its abit hard to remove....highly pigmentation..love the shade of red that was part of the few color that was produce.. and importance of matte lipstick... it does not make you lips chapping...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink keeps its name. It is really handy and easy to apply. I enjoyed my drinks without transferring the colour on glasses. :) and it actually stayed day long on lips giving me confidence to meet people without looking into mirror before. I somewhat found it sticky something like glue. Maybe matte liquids are like this as this was my first experience.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I've been using this lip ink for about a week. The color pigment is very thick and creamy while applying, able to last for few hours on the lip but a little bit dry.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: There is a smooth finish that lasts all day despite having meals and drinks, it did not budge! Even after i removed it at the end of the day, there was a little bit of color that was left on my lips. Love this lip ink and definitely purchasing it in other shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I really love this brand.  Especially the shades. When applying its very soft on the lips.  Now is my favorite lipstick..  I definitely buy again. Its a perfect and awesome producr.. I will recommend it to my friends 100 percent.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love the packaging! So pretty! It is highly pigmented and can last quite long. The texture is quite thick and needs some effort to spread. It has a strong smell though.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Okay so this is an interesting formular for a matte lippies. I have tons of reason to love it!     - it‚Äôs quick drying and transferproof.   - it‚Äôs sticky before it‚Äôs dries BUT its normal for a matte lippies.   - it has a velvet felt when u first applied BUT has a silky felt after. ( i even tried using lip balm over it and it‚Äôs okay!)   - Not only it‚Äôs pigmented and has vibrant colour, the one i received (creator) is a purple but has pink undertone and even after a greasy dinner i had it fade off and left a tint! Which is great  - The applicator of it‚Äôs great for matte lippies as i can outline my lips with it.     The only concern i have was, removing it. But there‚Äôs a specific ‚Äúeraser‚Äù for it. Or else it can last for almost a day!   I‚Äôll definitely use it again and buy the other colours too!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick is super pigmented with no doubt. Not liking the texture on my lip. Seems too sticky. Not recommended for ppl with dry lips. Dry line line will be quite obvious.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink is perfect for my lips. It does not smudge or transfer hence it stays for a long time without having to touch up. Additionally, it does not crack or peel like other matte lipsticks may do and my lipstick do not feel dry.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I just received the package yesterday and I tried it.  It is so perfect, I really love the color and it's very perfect on my lips.  It's matte and it stays longer as expected  I really love it

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: - Rich colour pigments with one swipe  - For a matte lipstick it transfer quite a bit but nothing too messy  - Long lasting even after i wiped it off with a make up remover towelette!  - Wide range of loud colour choices. My favourites!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The applicator is so sturdy that it's so easy to apply! And it stays forever! No smudging whatsoever no matter what I drank or ate. It was great and I loooooved the red! It's really a good buy for a matte lipstick!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Never thought that a light pink colour such as "Dreamer" would actually fit me! It goes on smoothly and isn't as drying as other matte lipsticks. Wore this out for dinner, although it cracks after contact (e.g. with food/water), the colour stays strong.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The product is amazingly lasting. Even after eating or even after going for swimming. It is very easy to apply as well. Unlike other matte lipsticks, maybelline super stay lipstick doesnt leave that dry feeling and cracked look on your lips.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I LOVE this lip stick!  I have very dry lips and i'm not someone who wear lipstick frequently due to the dryness and i'm a lazy person who doesnt like to touch up my make up. I've tried this lipstick on and for the whole day it stayed! The applicator is easy to use and precise. The only issue is, i prefers orangey shades but they doesnt come with it. The shade that i got is Lover and i personally think its too dark. Would wanna try the dreamer instead. And it'd be best if they launch more orangey shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The SuperStay Matte Ink from Maybelline is perfect for everyday wear! It smells good, super pigmented and with the perfect contoured applicator, it's super easy & fast to apply on for panic mommies like me. Just so u know, I tested it for a whole day of household chores! It lasted. I drank with it, eat with it. Had to remove it with a makeup remover frankly. Didnt stain my teacups too. Honestly, i love it. Its not drying unlike my other matte lippies. Ok im buying other colours definitely!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip tint is a bit sticky when apply but the longevity of the lip tint  stays on it when eat and drink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love how the pigment is strong and lasts throughout the day, literally.  However, the wand seems weird and its a bit hard to apply. Also, it has a sticky senstation through. Not forgetting to mention, it was so difficult to remove it!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Really amazed how non drying this liquid lipstick is!     Blot the excess and it will set non sticky.     It does have a rather strong scent, but it's not an unpleasant one.     The doe foot applicator gives you the most precise application, which is really important if you're wearing darker shades.    On the staying power -it's definitely kiss proof ;)  I had a greasy dinner with it on and product only came off from the middle of my bottom lip; close to my inner lip. Definitely reaching for this when I attend weddings and events!     Used the shade Voyager- flattering shade for an Asian with sallow skin; my skin looked brighter wearing it.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The smell is really sweet. It is very pigmented and bright in color. It is easy to apply. I would continue using it often.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Wow the formula for this is awesome, the pigmentation and it glides so one dip is all you need. Not drying at all...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Loves how easy and smooth it is to apply on my lip! The color is able to stay on after a long day out, hence it is recommended for people who is lazy to constantly touching up.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Love the neutral color & texture is pretty smooth to apply on.  Superstay Matte Ink provides moisture to my lips as well, will definitely recommend to my friends!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Just tried it and it lives up to its superstay reputation. Lasted through the whole day despite oily food and coffee straight from a cup. Colour is cute and matte, has a slightly sticky feeling to it but still "superstay". Not too used to the applicator yet but it comes with practice. Would recommend!!!

Review: I love that the color is very pigmented! However, in general, as matte lip products are very dry, I had to apply some lip mask/lip protector before applying this. Hence, the color will stain cups and burgers

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: First time using a liquid lisptick and I think I found myself a new fave lipstick - Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I had a heavy lunch and some desserts for tea break while wearing this and I was pleasantly surprised that I didn‚Äôt have to reapply throughout the day!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick fades away fast from my lips and I've tried a few brands. If it doesn't disappear fast, I think leaves my lips dry.     This lipstick is exactly what my lips needs.     Colour range is awesome - though I'd love for them to have more.     Application is smooth! One dip is more than enough. Trust me. All you need I say to apply thin - or at least enough to cover your lips.     It stays more than 16hours. I know, I'm not supposed to, but I accidentally slept with it. It stayed until the next day. That's about 24hrs!    Doesn't smudge too unless it's exposed to liquids for too long. Ie: in the shower for 10 minutes with constant water running down my face. With that said, there's no transfers when eating or drinking.     Oh! It also doesn't leave my lips dry.     Smells good. In case this isn't the case for everyone, I got the shade Lover.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Good last long but hard to to remove it off the color is nice and easy to wear... Love the color so much... Will try other color for sure but will find the way how to remove it in east way... But the feeling on lip is like so sticky less sticky will be better...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip product does works as it promise...it does stay up quite long till its abit hard to remove....highly pigmentation..love the shade of red that was part of the few color that was produce.. and importance of matte lipstick... it does not make you lips chapping...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink keeps its name. It is really handy and easy to apply. I enjoyed my drinks without transferring the colour on glasses. :) and it actually stayed day long on lips giving me confidence to meet people without looking into mirror before. I somewhat found it sticky something like glue. Maybe matte liquids are like this as this was my first experience.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: - Rich colour pigments with one swipe  - For a matte lipstick it transfer quite a bit but nothing too messy  - Long lasting even after i wiped it off with a make up remover towelette!  - Wide range of loud colour choices. My favourites!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The applicator is so sturdy that it's so easy to apply! And it stays forever! No smudging whatsoever no matter what I drank or ate. It was great and I loooooved the red! It's really a good buy for a matte lipstick!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The applicator is so sturdy that it's so easy to apply! And it stays forever! No smudging whatsoever no matter what I drank or ate. It was great and I loooooved the red! It's really a good buy for a matte lipstick!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Never thought that a light pink colour such as "Dreamer" would actually fit me! It goes on smoothly and isn't as drying as other matte lipsticks. Wore this out for dinner, although it cracks after contact (e.g. with food/water), the colour stays strong.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Never thought that a light pink colour such as "Dreamer" would actually fit me! It goes on smoothly and isn't as drying as other matte lipsticks. Wore this out for dinner, although it cracks after contact (e.g. with food/water), the colour stays strong.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I LOVE this lip stick!  I have very dry lips and i'm not someone who wear lipstick frequently due to the dryness and i'm a lazy person who doesnt like to touch up my make up. I've tried this lipstick on and for the whole day it stayed! The applicator is easy to use and precise. The only issue is, i prefers orangey shades but they doesnt come with it. The shade that i got is Lover and i personally think its too dark. Would wanna try the dreamer instead. And it'd be best if they launch more orangey shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I LOVE this lip stick!  I have very dry lips and i'm not someone who wear lipstick frequently due to the dryness and i'm a lazy person who doesnt like to touch up my make up. I've tried this lipstick on and for the whole day it stayed! The applicator is easy to use and precise. The only issue is, i prefers orangey shades but they doesnt come with it. The shade that i got is Lover and i personally think its too dark. Would wanna try the dreamer instead. And it'd be best if they launch more orangey shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The SuperStay Matte Ink from Maybelline is perfect for everyday wear! It smells good, super pigmented and with the perfect contoured applicator, it's super easy & fast to apply on for panic mommies like me. Just so u know, I tested it for a whole day of household chores! It lasted. I drank with it, eat with it. Had to remove it with a makeup remover frankly. Didnt stain my teacups too. Honestly, i love it. Its not drying unlike my other matte lippies. Ok im buying other colours definitely!!

Review: I really love this brand.  Especially the shades. When applying its very soft on the lips.  Now is my favorite lipstick..  I definitely buy again. Its a perfect and awesome producr.. I will recommend it to my friends 100 percent.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Okay so this is an interesting formular for a matte lippies. I have tons of reason to love it!     - it‚Äôs quick drying and transferproof.   - it‚Äôs sticky before it‚Äôs dries BUT its normal for a matte lippies.   - it has a velvet felt when u first applied BUT has a silky felt after. ( i even tried using lip balm over it and it‚Äôs okay!)   - Not only it‚Äôs pigmented and has vibrant colour, the one i received (creator) is a purple but has pink undertone and even after a greasy dinner i had it fade off and left a tint! Which is great  - The applicator of it‚Äôs great for matte lippies as i can outline my lips with it.     The only concern i have was, removing it. But there‚Äôs a specific ‚Äúeraser‚Äù for it. Or else it can last for almost a day!   I‚Äôll definitely use it again and buy the other colours too!

Product Name: Instant Age Rewind Dark Circle Eraser - (2-in-1 Concealer + Treatment) by Maybelline
Review: I have ordered 1 Honey & 1 Sand Colour in 2 separate order. On 19 Dec, I only received a Sand Colour and not Honey when I was asked to sign by their delivery courier, urban fox. I actually have submitted the details on this review but it's not reflected when I gave a 2 stars rating. The item I received on this order is Sand and also their invoice stated Sand Colour. Till date, I have yet to receive my other order but seller said I have acknowledged receipt. I was definitely very angry and upset when I realized that my signature has been fabricated. There're only 2 deliveries by urban fox. On 15 Dec, I received 2 Liese Hair colours and 19 Dec, a Sand Colour Concealer. I don't know where's my other order but I'm definitely sure that my signature has been fabricated. I pay for what I buy so I want my item. Why would I want to cheat you for a $14/- product. In view of this incident, I'm totally very upset about you and Lazada for simply ignore my concern.
